info: Only increases the hero's secondary attributes. The primary attribute is not increased.
For strength heroes, it grants 2.08 armor, 13 attack speed, 0.65% movement speed, 156 mana, 0.65 mana regen, and 0.91% spell damage.
For agility heroes, it grants 260 health, 1.3 health regen, 1.04% magic resistance, 156 mana, 0.65 mana regen, and 0.91% spell damage.
For intelligence heroes, it grants 260 health, 1.3 health regen, 1.04% magic resistance, 2.08 armor, 13 attack speed, and 0.65% movement speed.
